proposal: Hey Brainiacs, congrats on reaching 57 holders in the ETH network! Your project is like a sci-fi movie come to life, making the Brainiac films a reality by creating avatars from brain wave data. Imagine if these avatars could also participate in a blockchain-based lottery or even create their own DEX? With our B2B tools, they could do just that. Let's bring the metaverse to the next level together!
